QueryResult.text: ( SELECT F.ID ID, F.NAME NAME, U.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || U.LAST_NAME OWNER_NAME, FD.PATH_NAME || '/' || FD.NAME LOCATION, F.CREATED_DATE CREATED_DATE, P.USER_ID USER_ID, V.BYTE_SIZE BYTE_SIZE, V.ID VERSION_ID, V.VERSION_NUMBER VERSION_NUMBER, F.LAST_UPDATED_DATE MODIFIED_DATE FROM CMN_SEC_USERS U, CLB_DMS_FOLDERS FD, CLB_DMS_VERSIONS V, CLB_DMS_FILES F, cmn_sec_assgnd_obj_perm_r_v0 P WHERE F.OWNER_ID = U.ID AND F.ID = V.FILE_ID AND F.PARENT_FOLDER_ID = FD.ID AND F.AREA_ID = P.OBJECT_ID AND p.permission_value = 1 )
